featured.text: When a person smiles, the shorter-than-normal muscle pulls up the facial skin, which in turn creates a small indentation—or dimple—in the skin.

definition.zh_def: 縮排，指在文本中將行或段落的開頭向內移動的空白區域。
definition.en_def: The space at the beginning of a line or paragraph that is used to indicate a new section or to organize text visually.
definition.example: Make sure to use proper indentation when writing your code.
